T02TD3482E:131b-1: a'arya kha di ra ba n'i t'a r'a s'a dha nam /
T02TD3482E:131b-3: 'phags ma seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02TD3482E:131b-4: 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3482E:131b-5: sngon ma bzhin du stong pha nyid mthar thug pa bsgoms nas t'am gi sa bon yongs su gyur pa las /
T02TD3482E:131b-6: autpa la'i lte bar t'am gi sa bon no //
T02TD3482E:131b-7: de yongs su gyur pa las sku mdog ljang gu don yod grub pas dbu brgyan pa /
T02TD3482E:131b-8: mchog sbyin dang autpa la ni g-yas dang g-yon gyi phyag na bsnams pa'o //
T02TD3482E:131b-9: mya ngan med pa'i shing gi 'od zer can dang /
T02TD3482E:131b-10: ral pa gcig ma dag g-yas dang /
T02TD3482E:131b-11: g-yon gyi phyogs char gnas pa /
T02TD3482E:131b-12: gzhon nu mdzes shing rgyan dang ldan ma /
T02TD3482E:131b-13: seng ldeng gi nags su sna tshogs pa'i sems can gyi don byed par bsams la ye shes sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu byas te /
T02TD3482E:131b-14: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a zhes pa'i sngags bzlas la /
T02TD3482E:131b-15: de nyid kyi yid kyis ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o //
T02TD3482E:131b-16: seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02TD3482E:131b-18: // / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'o//
